title: Cabal
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Leonard Edmondson [1916-2002], CA; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, likely 1963 until April 1967 [1]; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1967.

Notes:
[1]. Purchased, likely in 1963, for $80. On a list dated March 1, 1966 (see curatorial file,) Mrs. Beal's notes suggest that the print was at the "19th National Exhibition of Prints," Library of Congress, which was held from May 1 to September 1, 1963. The print was accessioned by the museum on April 11, 1967.
